metadata.title: Police officer describes moment he was shot with crossbow - as attacker jailed

left: Jason King has been jailed for stabbing a neighbor and shooting an officer with a crossbow during a police confrontation.
The officer shot King in the leg after seeing him 'grinning' as he exited his home, causing a two to three-centimeter wound.
King threatened other officers with the crossbow, prompting police to return fire after he had already shot one officer.
Alistair Mahwuto, 63, stated that the incident had 'affected me more than I would have ever imagined.
